metadata.title: CVE-2018-17567 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Jekyll through 3.6.2, 3.7.x through 3.7.3, and 3.8.x through 3.8.3 allowsattackers to access arbitrary files by specifying a symlink in the"include" key in the "_config.yml" file.

criterions.comment: jekyll: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
